org.easybatch.integration.quartz

Class BatchScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.integration.quartz.BatchScheduler

  • public class BatchScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Quartz scheduler wrapper used to setup triggers.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)

      • scheduleAtWithInterval

        public void scheduleAtWithInterval(java.util.Date startTime,
                          int interval)
        Setup a trigger to start at a fixed point of time and repeat with interval period.
        Parameters:
        startTime - the start time
        interval - the repeat interval in minutes

      • scheduleCron

        public void scheduleCron(java.lang.String cronExpression)
        Setup a unix cron-like trigger.
        Parameters:
        cronExpression - the cron expression to use. For a complete tutorial about cron expressions, please refer to quartz reference documentation.

      • start

        public void start()
           throws BatchSchedulerException
        Start the scheduler.
        Throws:
        BatchSchedulerException - thrown if the scheduler cannot be started
